products.name: Slytherine
products.subtitle: Stylish cafe chair
products.description: A stylish and comfortable cafe chair with a minimalist design, perfect for modern spaces.
products.longDescription:
The Slytherine chair embodies minimalist elegance, featuring a sleek, durable frame and comfortable seating. Designed for cafe and contemporary dining settings, it offers ergonomic support and a lightweight build for easy rearrangement. Its clean lines complement any modern decor, making it a versatile addition to your space.

Crafted from high-quality materials, this chair is built to withstand daily use while maintaining its aesthetic appeal. The subtle curves provide surprising comfort, making it suitable for long conversations or quick meals. A perfect blend of style and practicality for your home or business.
products.materials: Powder-coated steel frame, Faux leather upholstery

products.name: Leviosa
products.subtitle: Stylish cafe chair
products.description: An elegantly designed chair that combines comfort with a unique aesthetic, perfect for any modern cafe.
products.longDescription:
The Leviosa chair is a testament to modern design, offering both visual appeal and exceptional comfort. Its unique shape provides a supportive backrest, while the sturdy base ensures stability. Ideal for cafe environments or contemporary dining rooms, this chair is a statement piece that doesn't compromise on functionality.

Crafted with attention to detail, the smooth finish and durable materials ensure longevity. The chair's lightweight nature allows for easy rearrangement, adapting to various layouts and needs. A blend of innovation and comfort for discerning tastes.
products.materials: Solid wood legs, Molded plastic seat

products.name: Lolito
products.subtitle: Luxury big sofa
products.description: A luxurious and spacious sofa, designed for ultimate comfort and elegance in large living spaces.
products.longDescription:
The Lolito sofa redefines luxury and comfort, featuring generous seating and plush cushions. Its robust frame and high-quality upholstery ensure durability and a sophisticated look. Perfect for grand living rooms, it invites relaxation and adds a touch of opulence to any decor.

Each element of the Lolito sofa is crafted to perfection, from its sturdy internal structure to its soft, inviting fabric. The modular design allows for flexible configurations, adapting to different room sizes and preferences. A centerpiece that promises both comfort and style for years to come.
products.materials: Solid wood frame, High-density foam, Velvet fabric

products.name: Respira
products.subtitle: Outdoor bar table and stool
products.description: A durable and stylish outdoor bar table with accompanying stools, designed for contemporary outdoor living.
products.longDescription:
The Respira outdoor bar set is engineered for durability and style, perfect for enhancing your patio or balcony. Crafted from weather-resistant materials, it offers a sturdy table and comfortable stools for outdoor dining or entertaining. Its modern design blends seamlessly with various outdoor aesthetics.

Built to withstand the elements, this set requires minimal maintenance, ensuring long-lasting beauty and function. The stools are designed for comfort, making it a great spot for morning coffee or evening cocktails. Elevate your outdoor living with this chic and practical bar set.

products.name: Slytherine Lounge
products.subtitle: Comfortable lounge chair
products.description: A spacious and inviting lounge chair, perfect for relaxation in your living room or study.
products.longDescription:
This Slytherine Lounge chair offers unparalleled comfort with its deep seating and soft upholstery. Its contemporary design fits perfectly in any modern living space, providing a cozy nook for reading or unwinding. The sturdy construction ensures lasting durability and support.

Featuring a high-resilience foam core wrapped in plush fabric, this chair maintains its shape and comfort over time. The solid wood base adds a touch of warmth and stability, making it both beautiful and functional. A perfect addition to your home for ultimate relaxation.

products.name: Leviosa Ottoman
products.subtitle: Versatile ottoman stool
products.description: A multi-functional ottoman that serves as extra seating, a footrest, or a stylish accent piece.
products.longDescription:
The Leviosa Ottoman is designed for versatility and comfort, making it a valuable addition to any room. Use it as a comfortable footrest, extra seating when guests arrive, or even a makeshift coffee table with a tray. Its compact size and elegant design ensure it fits seamlessly into various decor styles.

Constructed with a sturdy internal frame and upholstered in durable fabric, this ottoman is built for everyday use. Its lightweight nature allows for easy repositioning, adapting to your changing needs. A practical and stylish piece that enhances both comfort and functionality in your living space.

products.name: Lolito Bookshelf
products.subtitle: Contemporary wooden bookshelf
products.description: A spacious and modern wooden bookshelf, perfect for organizing your books and decorative items.
products.longDescription:
The Lolito Bookshelf combines ample storage with sleek, contemporary design. Crafted from high-quality wood, it offers multiple shelves to display your book collection, decor, or personal treasures. Its minimalist aesthetic allows it to blend seamlessly into various room styles, from modern to traditional.

Designed for stability and durability, this bookshelf is easy to assemble and maintain. The open-back design allows for easy cable management if used for electronics, and its robust construction supports a substantial weight capacity. A functional and elegant piece for any home or office.

products.name: Respira Console Table
products.subtitle: Minimalist nightstand
products.description: A minimalist and elegant console table, perfect for entryways or as a stylish accent piece.
products.longDescription:
The Respira Console Table is a sleek, minimalist design that adds functional style to any space. Its slim profile makes it ideal for hallways, entryways, or behind a sofa, offering a convenient surface for essentials without occupying much space. The clean lines and neutral tones ensure it complements diverse interiors.

Constructed with a sturdy metal frame and a smooth tabletop, this console table is built for stability and longevity. Its simple assembly makes it easy to set up, providing instant elegance and utility. A perfect piece for organizing your essentials and enhancing your home's aesthetic.

products.name: Slytherine Dining Chair
products.subtitle: Ergonomic dining chair
products.description: An ergonomically designed dining chair that offers superior comfort and style for your dining area.
products.longDescription:
The Slytherine Dining Chair is crafted for long-lasting comfort and sophisticated style, making every meal a more enjoyable experience. Its ergonomic backrest provides excellent support, while the cushioned seat ensures plush seating. The chair's design is versatile, fitting well with various dining table styles.

Built with a durable frame and upholstered in a stain-resistant fabric, this dining chair is designed for everyday family life. Its clean lines and understated elegance make it a perfect addition to modern and classic dining spaces. Easy to clean and maintain, ensuring beauty and functionality for years.

products.name: Leviosa Bedside Table
products.subtitle: Compact bedside table
products.description: A compact and stylish bedside table, perfect for small spaces, offering convenience and modern design.
products.longDescription:
The Leviosa Bedside Table is a compact yet functional piece, ideal for keeping essentials close at hand in your bedroom. Its sleek design and small footprint make it perfect for smaller rooms, while its sturdy construction ensures durability. A convenient drawer provides discreet storage for personal items.

Crafted from high-quality engineered wood with a smooth finish, this table is easy to clean and maintain. The minimalist aesthetic allows it to blend seamlessly with various bedroom decors, from contemporary to classic. A practical and elegant addition that enhances your bedside convenience.

products.name: Lolito Coffee Table
products.subtitle: Contemporary coffee table
products.description: A large and stylish coffee table, designed to be the centerpiece of your living room, offering ample surface area.
products.longDescription:
The Lolito Coffee Table is a bold statement piece for any modern living room, combining expansive surface area with sophisticated design. Crafted from premium materials, its sturdy construction and sleek finish make it both functional and visually striking. Perfect for entertaining or daily use, it anchors your seating area with elegance.

Featuring a durable top ideal for beverages, books, and decor, this coffee table is designed for lasting beauty. Its low profile and strong build make it a practical yet luxurious addition, inviting social gatherings and comfortable living. Elevate your living space with this contemporary masterpiece.

products.name: Respira Floor Lamp
products.subtitle: Elegant floor lamp
products.description: An elegant floor lamp with a minimalist design, providing ambient lighting and a touch of modern sophistication.
products.longDescription:
The Respira Floor Lamp offers refined illumination with its slender profile and elegant design. Perfect for living rooms, studies, or bedrooms, it casts a warm, inviting glow that enhances the ambiance of any space. Its minimalist aesthetic ensures it complements a wide range of interior styles without overcrowding.

Constructed with a sturdy metal base and a durable fabric shade, this lamp is built for stability and long-term use. The simple foot-switch operation adds convenience, while its sleek lines provide a contemporary touch. A functional and beautiful addition that brightens your home with understated elegance.

The Leviosa Bedside Table is a compact yet functional piece, ideal for keeping essentials close at hand in your bedroom. Its sleek design and small footprint make it perfect for smaller rooms, while its sturdy construction ensures durability. A convenient drawer provides discreet storage for personal items.

Crafted from high-quality engineered wood with a smooth finish, this table is easy to clean and maintain. The minimalist aesthetic allows it to blend seamlessly with various bedroom decors, from contemporary to classic. A practical and elegant addition that enhances your bedside convenience.

products.name: Lolito Coffee Table
products.subtitle: Contemporary coffee table
products.description: A large and stylish coffee table, designed to be the centerpiece of your living room, offering ample surface area.
products.longDescription:
The Lolito Coffee Table is a bold statement piece for any modern living room, combining expansive surface area with sophisticated design. Crafted from premium materials, its sturdy construction and sleek finish make it both functional and visually striking. Perfect for entertaining or daily use, it anchors your seating area with elegance.

Featuring a durable top ideal for beverages, books, and decor, this coffee table is designed for lasting beauty. Its low profile and strong build make it a practical yet luxurious addition, inviting social gatherings and comfortable living. Elevate your living space with this contemporary masterpiece.

products.name: Respira Floor Lamp
products.subtitle: Elegant floor lamp
products.description: An elegant floor lamp with a minimalist design, providing ambient lighting and a touch of modern sophistication.
products.longDescription:
The Respira Floor Lamp offers refined illumination with its slender profile and elegant design. Perfect for living rooms, studies, or bedrooms, it casts a warm, inviting glow that enhances the ambiance of any space. Its minimalist aesthetic ensures it complements a wide range of interior styles without overcrowding.

Constructed with a sturdy metal base and a durable fabric shade, this lamp is built for stability and long-term use. The simple foot-switch operation adds convenience, while its sleek lines provide a contemporary touch. A functional and beautiful addition that brightens your home with understated elegance.
